abstract: Los Angeles, which has won four straight games in M.L.S., enters Tuesday's match in Red Bull Arena at the end of a brutal stretch: four games in 10 days, eight in 26.
snippet: Los Angeles, which has won four straight games in M.L.S., enters Tuesday's match in Red Bull Arena at the end of a brutal stretch: four games in 10 days, eight in 26.
lead_paragraph: HOBOKEN, N.J. - A flash of brilliance by Thierry Henry on Saturday night in Toronto did not save the Red Bulls' season as much as preserve it for yet another must-win game.

headline.main: Galaxy Visit Red Bulls Looking to Clinch Top Record
